title: Costa Bellene/Ballene (Capo Don?)
description: A Roman mansio on the via Iulia Augusta. An Early Christian complex (basilica, baptistery, cemetery) developed nearby and lasted until the Middle Ages.

properties.description: The place where archaeologists have tentatively identified the ancient Costa Balenae/Bellene.
properties.title: Capo Don

properties.description: Remains of Early Christian baptistery and church. Location based on OpenStreetMap
properties.title: Costa Balenae archaeological area
